name: The Worsening Department
description:
A game for Quest 2 standalone

You're back from your lunch break and you have to make some widgets worse so they will sell more. If the product is perfect, it never breaks and people never buy a new one. But if the product is really bad, people will buy a new one right away! So you have to make these widgets really terrible so people will buy them.

This is your hard-driving CEO:

And this is you:

Have a worse day.

------------

CREDITS

A game by Beard or Die.

Some artwork generated by OpenAI Dall-E 2 before modification.

Frameworks:
BNG VR Interaction Framework (primary interaction/locomotion)
UltimateXR (some interaction, audio, lots of meshes and materials)
